page.title: 20HOUSING 2
page.content: The Sports Dome which is the only real sporting facility for both locals and tourists, will need replacing soon. The committee are trying to arrange the construction of a permanent building, probably on the site of the old dome, costing in the region of Â£400,000. There are plans for an industrial estate at Aldour. The location has the advantages that it is flat, has good road access, has tree screening and the ground is disused. There has already been resistance to the scheme by locals. The school is hoping to get a new sports area, taking part of the Hydro Hotel golf course which is scheduled for re-development, thus allowing , for the first time, a rugby pitch, as well as football pitches, an athletics track etc.
